lithology.description: Sand:  Colorless  to white, f ew brow nish grain , loose, transparent to translucent, angular  to sub -angular, medi um to fine grain ed, coarse in place,  poorly  sorted, predominantly quartz with some mica & dark color minerals & traces  of coal grain .
Clay:  Light Grey to Gray in color. Very soft . No react with HCL.

Sand:  Colorless  to white, f ew brow nish grain , loose, transparent to translucent, angular  to sub -angular, medium to fine grain ed, coarse in place,  moderately  sorted, predominantly quartz with some mica & dark color minerals & presence  of coal fragments.
Clay:  Light Grey to Gray in color. Very soft . No react with HCL.
A/A + Medium to Coarse grained  + Poorly So rted
Clay:  Light Grey to Gray in color. Very soft . No react with HCL.

Clay:  Light Grey to Gray in color. Very soft . No react with HCL.
